DOC.brief_summary: This study will test the efficacy and safety of topical Voltaren in the treatment of knee osteoarthritis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety of Diclofenac Sodium Gel in Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Key Inclusion criteria â€¢ Osteoarthritis of the knee Key Exclusion criteria Other rheumatic disease, such as rheumatoid arthritis Active gastrointestinal ulcer during the last year Known allergy to analgesic drugs
DOC.keyword: Knee osteoarthritis, Topical NSAID, Diclofenac sodium
